verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had made an <S%G5055>end<s%> of <S%G1299>commanding<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> he <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> and show John again <S%G518><s%> <S%G2491><s%> those <S%G3739>things<s%> which ye do <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> see: <S%G991><s%>

The <S%G5185>blind<s%> receive their <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> the <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are raised <S%G1453>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> have the gospel preached to them. <S%G2097><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he, whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G4624>offended<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5130>they<s%> <S%G4198>departed,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> What <S%G5101><s%> went ye <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to <S%G2300>see?<s%> A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the wind? <S%G417><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> went ye <S%G1831>out<s%> for to <S%G1492>see?<s%> A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G294>clothed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3120>soft<s%> <S%G2440>raiment?<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they that <S%G5409>wear<s%> <S%G3120>soft<s%> clothing <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G935>kings'<s%> houses. <S%G3624><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> went ye <S%G1831>out<s%> for to <S%G1492>see?<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet?<s%> <S%G3483>yea,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G1722>Among<s%> them that are <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%> there hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1453>risen<s%> a <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> Baptist: <S%G910><s%> <S%G1161>notwithstanding<s%> he that is <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than he. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5101>whereunto<s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation?<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> like <S%G3664>unto<s%> <S%G3808>children<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>markets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4377>calling<s%> unto <S%G848>their<s%> fellows, <S%G2083><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We have <S%G832>piped<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3738>danced;<s%> we have <S%G2354>mourned<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye have <S%G3756>not<s%> lamented. <S%G2875><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say,<s%> He <S%G2192>hath<s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5314>gluttonous,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3630>winebibber,<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners.<s%> <S%G2532>But<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> children. <S%G5043><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> It shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4771>thou,<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> which art <S%G5312>exalted<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shalt be brought <S%G2601>down<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> hell: <S%G86><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works,<s%> which have been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> had been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> it would have <S%G3306>remained<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> this day. <S%G4594><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> it shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for thee. <S%G4671><s%>

Even <S%G3483>so,<s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it <S%G1096>seemed<s%> <S%G2107>good<s%> in thy sight. <S%G1715><s%> <S%G4675><s%>

All <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1921>knoweth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1921>knoweth<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he to whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G601>reveal<s%> him.

Come <S%G1205><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> ye that <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are heavy <S%G5412>laden,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> will give you rest. <S%G373><s%> <S%G5209><s%>
